|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{WiFiCert|WFA19421|08/29/2013}} :This certification also applies to the ''RT-AC68R'' {{seealso|ASUS RT-AC68}} ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://press.asus.com/asus-announces-next-generation-wi-fi-devices-and-new-portable-projector/ ''ASUS Announces Next-Generation Wi-Fi Devices'' on '''ASUS''' ''Press Release''] *[http://www.bestbuy.com/site/asus-wirelessac1900-dual-band-gigabit-wireless-router/8448381.p?id=1219334566012&skuId=8448381 ''Asus RT-AC68P Dual-band Wireless-AC1900 Gigabit Router'' on '''BestBuy'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31778-broadcom-announces-beefed-up-socs-to-power-up-draft-80211ac-products ''Broadcom Announces Beefed-Up SoCs To Power Up Draft 802.11ac Products''
on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32609-asus-rt-ac68p-dual-band-wireless-ac1900-gigabit-router-reviewed ''ASUS RT-AC68P Wireless-AC1900 Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=940334 On '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=20297 On '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] :[http://paste.debian.net/128628/ Asus RT-AC68P boot log] ==Notes== ===FCC Info=== Multiple manufacturers are noted within the [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAC68UV2 FCC] test report *[[Askey]] ''Technology'' (Jiangsu) Ltd. *[[Compal]] ''Networking (KunShan)'' Co., LTD. ([[Arcadyan]]) :The FCC label indicates the int. [[Arcadyan]] model :is ''WG9117EAC33 1-ASU'' ([http://www.arcadyan.com/contentPage.aspx?type=product-detail&L2id=153&prod2id=180 WG9117GAC]) *The ''ASUS'' logo, "RT-AC68U-V2", "REV 2.20" and "HannStar KMV-4" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :'''CPU''': [[Broadcom]] BCM4709A0KFEBG (TT1348;P10;E90YZ.7-01;Z1A) :'''WLAN''': 2x [[Broadcom]] BCM4360KMLG (TE1403;P20;348143;3W) :'''Flash''': ''Spansion'' S34ML01G100TFI00 (411BB132;A12;SPANSION) :'''RAM''': ''ESMT'' M15F2G16128A-BDB (KPF1;T30L901;341) :'''Quarz''': 40MHz (X3, X4), 25MHz (X2) :'''OUI''': 10:C3:78 ===cpu info===
